thoughts.text: I think I should use the `execute_shell` command to check the Python version.
thoughts.reasoning: Using the `execute_shell` command to check the Python version will allow me to determine which version of Python is installed on the system. This information will be helpful in determining which Python libraries and modules I can use for my project.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the `execute_shell` command to check the Python version
- Review the output to determine which version of Python is installed on the system
- Use this information to determine which Python libraries and modules I can use for my project
thoughts.criticism: I need to make sure that I am not relying too heavily on the Python version and that I am still using my own judgement to determine which libraries and modules will be beneficial for my project.
thoughts.speak: I think I should use the `execute_shell` command to check the Python version.
